name: WEI YAN
title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
desc: Associate and highly motivated developer with passion and around 3 years’ experience in efficiently coding websites and applications using modern HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js. Translate designs to front-end code. Eager to embrace challenges and learn more. Excited to bring my skills to a new environment as a Full-Stack developer.
skills: Three years of work experience in building web applications. Projects including responsive website, single-page application and multi-page application.

Familiar with frameworks like React and related skills, such like redux, react-hook, react-router, webpack, babel etc. Scored in top 81st percentile of all React.js framework test takers using IKM TeckChek.
Confident with JavaScript, ES6, Html5, CSS3. Experience in TypeScript and React-Native.
Ten years’ experience of working related to software engineering. Comfortable with asynchronous programming, testing and complicate workflows. A collaborative team worker with strong motivation.

Appropriate knowledge of back-end development (mainly in Node.js, Express) and database (like MongoDB, Redis). Deeply understand how the back-end and front-end work together with APIs like RESTful and GraphQL.
Familiar with front-end tools, like NPM, Yarn, Git, VScode, etc.
Enjoy solving complex problems in the independent work. Eager to study new technologies. A fast and passionate learner.
Experience in deploying websites on Linux server with AWS, Docker, Nginx, Firebase.
Good at communication in English (CLBA-8) and Mandarin.
